cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on November 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5029, Expanding the Families of Veterans Access to Mental Health Services Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 146 (Friday, August 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROUZER:
H.R. 5029.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article l, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H4331]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: Expanding the Families of Veterans Access to Mental Health Services Act
